pullrequest.title: add pkg-config as a base dependency, so we can use it for an ign-cmake test

content.raw:
we also have the `BUILDING_DEPENDENCIES`variable available to use in package scripts for those that define a short list of dependencies. I took the liberty of modifying this PR in [a6f7816](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/a6f7816c4e131cabb7f5250f9826bbb4de92caf2?at=default) to use it instead of modifying the `BASE_DEPENCENCIES`. Mainly because changing `BASE_DEPENDENCIES` will trigger the rebuild of all docker images and containers across the whole buildfarm.

Tested here: [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition\_cmake-ci-pr\_any-xenial-amd64/64](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_cmake-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64/64)
